item.title: Web scraping deaths from gedenkzeit.ch
item.description: Web scraping with rvest https://www.gedenkzeit.ch/ is a Swiss obituary platform. The goal is to get the dates of birth and dates of death. rvest relies on xml2 package. # getting data from gedenkzeit.ch library(tidyverse) library(lubridate) library(rvest) library(gender) base <- "https://www.gedenkzeit.ch/Todesanzeigen/_/_/_/0/0/" from <- 1 to <- 3 data <- tibble() for (i in from:to) { link <- paste0(base, from) #> Loading required package: xml2 html <- read_html(link) rawnames <- html_nodes(html, ".
